text: (napiye!) Nam um'mai ivvare oru kuttattaritam anuppi vaittom; ivarkalukku munnarum pala kuttattinar niccayamakac cenrirukkirarkal; nam um mitu etai vahiyaka arivittomo atai ivarkalukku otikkanpippatarkaka (um'mai anuppinom); anal ivarkalo arrahma(n enum arul mikka iraiva)naiye nirakarikkinranar. Avarkalitam; "avane en iraivan; avanait tavira veru nayan evanumillai avan mite nam mulamaiyaka nampikkai vaittirukkiren. Avanitame (ennutaiya) mitciyum irukkiratu' enru nir kuruviraka
